/** * A complex type definition schema component traverser. * * <complexType * abstract = boolean : false * block = (#all | List of (extension | restriction)) * final = (#all | List of (extension | restriction)) * id = ID * mixed = boolean : false * name = NCName * {any attributes with non-schema namespace . . .}> * Content: (annotation?, (simpleContent | complexContent | * ((group | all | choice | sequence)?, * ((attribute | attributeGroup)*, anyAttribute?)))) * </complexType> * * @xerces.internal * * @version $Id: XSDComplexTypeTraverser.java,v 1.49 2005/04/19 18:49:47 mrglavas Exp $ */
